lines.text: You know, I wouldn't be a bit surprised if it was me that tricked you.
Welcome to Jellostone, Doc. A restful retreat.
Westful wetweat - Bawoney! I'll show you. Take that!
[Begins hacking at the sign with an axe]
And that! And that! And that! Peace and wewaxation, huh? Wubbish! Take that! And that! And that! And...
[Turns to see a park ranger glowering over him; Elmer grins]

[in jail]
Well, anyway, I'm wid of that gwizzwy bear and scwewy wabbit. West and wewaxation at wast!

[on bottom bunk of Elmer's cell]
Eh, pardon me, but how long ya in for, Doc?

[on top bunk]
Yeah, yeah, uh, pardon me, but how long ya in for, Doc?

[after nailing a board over Bugs's hole]
That'll hold him alwight, heh heh heh heh heh.

[opens the board over his hole, imitating Elmer]
That'll hold him alwight, heh heh heh heh heh. Phooey!
